<<BR>>
 '''Time:''' 1.00 PM <<BR>>
 '''Venue:''' Pelita Restaurant, Jalan Ampang. <<BR>>

On July 2008, Ubuntu Malaysia Team have successfully organized a Meet Up at Pelita Restaurant, Jalan Ampang (Near KLCC). This meet up was held in order to have further discussions on how to improve and grow Ubuntu Community in Malaysia.

==== Agenda ====

The real agenda of this meeting is to get to know each others in ubuntu-my community. Then we are going to discuss on how to improve Ubuntu Malaysia community as well.

=== Minutes ===

* Discuss on how to organize install feast event in Malaysia
* More Public Awareness programs ( focus on IPT ) 
* Introduce Ubuntu on Orphanage House 
* Suggested open donation (like old computer) then setup ubuntu on it 
* Approaching other sponsors for ubuntu community
* Discussion on joining Events at MMU - Software Freedom Day (September)
* Will also join any other open source / related Events
* Discuss on how to approach and focus on IPT students
* Other media promotions. Forum, IRC, Newspaper, magazine and so on.
* BuffaloSoldier '''Highlight:''' Short Term Target to achieve by the end of this year:
** To get ubuntu-my as Official LoCo Team
** To have more official ubuntu members from Malaysia. Currently we have 4 so make it at least double like 8 or more.
* Melayubuntu suggesting e-maj as more practical approach to malay readers. Trying to follow how Japan tech mags are written with full of useful informations.
* To improve Ubuntu-my Objective on wiki.
* Request on Ubuntu-my t-shirt reprint. Tajul & nick are willing to handle it. Agreed on first 100 prints.
* Eric says ubuntu.com.my website is empty and not enough links (to planet, forums, wiki and so on)
* Will have scheduled and maturely discussed events
* Problem with Session ID on forums.ubuntu.com.my
* Will we invite canonical to Malaysia?
* To have a list of vendors or opensource consultants to help with ubuntu solutions for companies.
 

=== Conclusion ===

Everybody was agreed with focusing on this short term target while still working on any personal interest in contributing to ubuntu community.

* Short Term Target to achieve by the end of this year:
** To get ubuntu-my as Official LoCo Team
** To have more official ubuntu members from Malaysia. Currently we have 4 so make it at least double like 8 or more.
